gender.name: male
gender.openmrs_reference_term: INSERT INTO `openmrs`.`concept_reference_term` (`concept_source_id`, `name`, `code`, `creator`, `date_created`, `retired`, `uuid`) SELECT * FROM (SELECT (SELECT concept_source_id FROM concept_reference_source WHERE name='TBR'), ' male' name, ' male' code, 1 creator, NOW() created, 0 retired, UUID() uuid) as tmp WHERE NOT EXISTS (  SELECT code FROM concept_reference_term WHERE code = ' male' ) LIMIT 1;

gender.name: female
gender.openmrs_reference_term: INSERT INTO `openmrs`.`concept_reference_term` (`concept_source_id`, `name`, `code`, `creator`, `date_created`, `retired`, `uuid`) SELECT * FROM (SELECT (SELECT concept_source_id FROM concept_reference_source WHERE name='TBR'), ' female' name, ' female' code, 1 creator, NOW() created, 0 retired, UUID() uuid) as tmp WHERE NOT EXISTS (  SELECT code FROM concept_reference_term WHERE code = ' female' ) LIMIT 1;

instance.openmrs_code: TBR: return after lost to followup

label.Roman Urdu: Shehr: ${provider_city} ; Town: ${provider_town} ; UC: ${provider_uc} ; Center ka naam: ${provider_location_name}
Mareez ko kis qism ka TB hai

instance.openmrs_code: TBR: return after lost to followup

label.Roman Urdu: Kitney mahiney se ilaaj jari hai

children.name: treatment_regimen
children.choice_filter:
( (name = 'rhzes' or name = 'rhze') and ${treatment_phase} = 'intensive' ) or 
( (name = 'rhe' or name = 'rh') and ${treatment_phase} = 'continuation' ) or 
name = 'other'

jr:constraintMsg.English: Maximum 20 digits and cannot contain anything other than number
Must be at least a year old and less than 150 years of age

label.English: Have you had an HIV test in the past?
label.Roman Urdu: Kya aapne HIV ka test pishley 6 mahino mein karwaya hai?

label.English: If yes, what is your HIV status?

jr:constraintMsg.English: Phone number should be 11 digits in the following format: 03*********
jr:constraintMsg.Roman Urdu: Phone number 11 hindason par mushtamil aur mundarja zail shakal main hona chahiey: 03*********

children.name: subcounty
children.choice_filter: (village=${village} and city=${parish} and district=${district}) or district='na'

label.Roman Urdu: Agli Tareeq 30 din baad deni hai?
Agar haan, tou aagli tareeq yeh hai
